hypothesis_content.title: Post-News Sentiment Reversal with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: Following significant crypto news (sentiment score magnitude > 0.7), when price moves opposite to news sentiment direction by >1.5% within 30 minutes on volume >150% of 20-period average, a fade trade in the initial price direction will be profitable within 2 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: High-volume moves against strong news sentiment often represent overreaction or 'smart money' positioning against retail sentiment. The volume confirmation suggests conviction in the counter-move, increasing probability of reversal.
entry_conditions: BTC price moves opposite to sentiment direction by >1.5%
Volume during move >150% of 20-period average volume
RSI(14) on 15-minute chart is not in extreme territory (>70 or <30)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 50% of the initial opposite move OR 1.8% gain
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price continues another 1% in opposite direction

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 40% of signals achieve take-profit before stop-loss across all regimes over 100+ occurrences.
